Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PeNi1 (like natural AMPs; Gly-rich; Nigrocin, frog, amphibians, animals, XXU, 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: true frog,Pelophylax nigromaculatus(formerly Rana nigromaculata), Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (90.48%) toNigrocin-2G: 29%; L: 24%; V: 19%; K: 14%  GRAVY: 1.24; M Wt:  2014.564; Mol formula: C90H164N24O23S2; Mol ex coeff: 125.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 4 ug/ml), S. enteritidis (MIC 8-16 ug/ml), and S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 4 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC: HC50 128 ug/ml or more.
Literature Information.Author: Richter A, Sutherland D, Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, Li C, Coombe L, Lin D, Warren RL, Yanai A, Kotkoff M, Helbing CC, Hof F, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Associating biological activity and predicted structure of antimicrobial peptides from amphibians and insects
